about_the_game:
--STORY--

Your cool tough dad established an Inn deep inside a monster infested forest, only the strongest adventurers would make the trip out to stay there. It's been left to you to run the place!

The only guests you have to look out for these days are a trio, the strongest sexiest, adventurers in the business; Lobelia, the red-headed rogue, she's positively down bad for a strong guy. Licilis, a classic elven mage. Her ice magic may be as cold as her attitude but that makes her just a little too confident in battle and the bedroom. Finally, there is Rune, the motherly cleric. She means well but the doting might get on some people's nerves, maybe you can give her a couple of children to keep her busy...

They really only came out here to jump your old man's bones after they heard of his epic strength! But lets be real- it doesn't matter who they thought they were going to find at the Inn, all that matters is you're here and for whatever prowess you lack in the monster hunting department you can make up for in the sadistic bedroom overlord department!

You'll have to do your best for your guests. Get them to forget all about being the #1 adventurer trio and instead have them compete to be your #1 onahole!

--FEATURES--

  • Translated version of the original Japanese Visual Novel

  • All the Inn's guests are fully voiced with original Japanese dialogue

  • Original artwork HD upscaled with 16:9 and 4:3 variants

  • Hours of story content

  • Audio including music and special effects

  • Enhanced with animated character sprites

  • Gallery and Scene selections

  • Showcase all sorts of sexy sadistic services available at the Inn in over a dozen H-Scenes!

Harem Inn is the English localization of a Visual Novel originally created by prolific Japanese developer Miel. We at Cherry Kiss aim to provide an authentic Japanese Visual Novel experience to gamers outside of Japan.

**PLEASE NOTE**

All characters described and visually represented in this game are over 18 years of age, and no actual, nor identifiable minor was used in the production of this game.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains strong language, general mature content, scenes depicting explicit sexual content, consumption of alcohol, characters engage in BDSM, elements including; domination, sexual accessories, tattooing, bondage, and impact play.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Version: 10.10+
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Harem Inn

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound

Sexuelle Inhalte
Alkohol / Tabak
Derbe Sprache

short_description: There's rooms to spare at Harem Inn! Deep in the woods, surrounded by monsters, full of sexy adventurer gals! You'll have to do your best to deliver some five-star service to keep these guests satisfied!
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
